attributes.action: To investigate into the Rohingya Muslim crisis in Burma and send immediate aid.
attributes.additional_details:
Rohingya Muslims by the Myanmar Army. These sadly include reports of military firing on villagers from helicopter gunships, burning countless homes, arbitrary arrests, and raping women and girls.
• A recent Human Rights Watch (HRW) report showing high-definition satellite imagery of the burnt and destroyed Rohingya villages.
• The number of people displaced internally and taking refuge elsewhere.  

Rohingya Muslims are being ripped of human rights and we as humans need to step in and stop it.
attributes.background: The United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR) claims that people are fleeing their homes, whole villages are being burnt, indiscriminate killings, tortures, rape and sexual assault of Rohingya Muslims and the destruction of mosques and villages.
